description: CONTRACT_TITLE-AMENDMENT TO- CLOSING TIME- PLEASE DISREGARD THE Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time- and Buyandsell posting closing time- - All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted August 01, 2023 by 14:00EDT- All bids submitted after 14:00EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive - ONLY TBIPS SA HOILERS HOLDING A TBIPS SA FOR TIER 2 AT THE TIME OF BID CLOSING IN ALL REQUIRED RESOURCE CATEGORIES IN THIS SOLICITATION AND IN THE NATIONAL CAPITAL REGION UNDER THE EN578-170432 SERIES OF SAS ARE ELIGIBLE TO COMPETE THIS REQUIREMENT IS FOR THE PROVISION OF INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES TO HELP CBSA PROVIDE GUIDANCE EXPERTISE DELIVERABLES AND ASSISTANCE TO PERFORM THE DEVELOPMENT CONFIGURATION INTEGRATION AND POST IMPLEMENTATION MAINTENANCE SUPPORT OF THE CBSA ARCHITECTURE COMPONENTS- IT IS INTENDED TO RESULT IN THE AWARD OF ONE CONTRACT FOR THREE YEARS PLUS TWO ONE YEAR IRREVOCABLE OPTIONS ALLOWING CANADA TO EXTEND THE TERM OF THE CONTRACT
duration_in_months: os means the date the contract is signed, or 36 months whichever is the least

full_summary:
**Title**
Professional Services for IBM Master Data Management (MDM)

**Reference Number**
WS4015434631-Doc4015452365

**Amendment Number**
4

**Publication Date**
June 19, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**
August 1, 2023, 2:00 PM EDST

**Solicitation Number**
WS4015434631

**Categories and Subject**
This solicitation pertains to the provision of Information Technology Consultation Services, specifically related to the IBM Master Data Management (MDM) software.

**Tendering Type**
Competitive, Selective Tendering

**Trade Agreements**
This solicitation is open to contractors who are registered under various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

**Contract Requirements**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) intends to award one (1) contract for the provision of professional services to help the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) implement the IBM Master Data Management (MDM) software. The contract will be for three (3) years, with the option to extend for two (2) additional years. Only registered holders of a TBIPS Service Agreement (SA) in Tier 2, with the required resource categories, are eligible to compete.

**Contact Information**
For further information, please contact:
Bhattacharya, Surupa (SPAC/PSPC)
surupa.bhattacharya@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Note: This is the original entry provided by the contractor. I took the liberty to correct the formatting and some minor grammar errors to make it more readable. However, for an official document, it is recommended to have a professional proofreader review it for any potential errors or discrepancies. ~~

Neil~psychodigger April
